requirements.summary: Redeploy the complete Raavni Agrobyte website application to the Internet Computer with all existing features and current configuration
acceptanceCriteria: Application successfully deploys to the Internet Computer
All frontend components (Navigation, Hero, AboutUs, CoreTeam, Products, FarmerSupport, Contact, Footer) render correctly
All static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated are accessible
Backend canister is operational and accessible
Website is accessible via the canister URL

file_operations.description: Verify that all existing sections (Navigation, Hero, AboutUs, CoreTeam, Products, FarmerSupport, Contact, Footer) are correctly imported and rendered in the proper order with semantic HTML structure and section IDs intact

Verify navigation component renders with sticky positioning, mobile menu toggle, scroll-based styling, and smooth scrolling to all sections (home, about, team, products, farmer-support, contact, dns-guide) with active section highlighting

Verify hero section displays with full-screen background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png, Raavni Agrobyte logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/raavni-logo-transparent.dim_400x200.png, headline text, feature pills, and CTA buttons
Verify About section displays company information, story content, team image, and four value cards (women empowerment, quality excellence, social impact, natural goodness) with correct styling

Verify Core Team section displays four team member profile cards with images from frontend/public/assets/generated/ (including cache-busted Barnali image and other team member images), names, roles, descriptions, and LinkedIn link placeholders in responsive grid layout

Verify Products section displays Milletmist Protein Bar and Energy Boost products with images from frontend/public/assets/generated/protein-bar-product.dim_800x800.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/energy-product.dim_800x800.png, descriptions, benefit badges, and millet benefits section

Verify Farmer Support component displays hero section with farmer imagery from frontend/public/assets/generated/farmer-hands-millet.dim_1000x667.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/women-farmers.dim_1200x800.png, impact cards showing direct partnership, sustainable income, training, and community building initiatives with detailed text
Verify Contact section renders three cards displaying address, email addresses with mailto links, and phone number with tel link, along with call-to-action message
Verify Footer component displays Raavni Agrobyte branding, copyright information with dynamic year, company logo, and attribution link to caffeine.ai

Verify DNS Configuration Guide component displays comprehensive instructions for Cloudflare setup, retrieves canister URL from backend, and shows CNAME records, SSL/TLS settings, and verification steps

Verify global Tailwind CSS styles with custom CSS variables for warm earth-tone color scheme (terracotta, sage, amber) supporting light and dark modes, custom gradient utilities, and typography using Inter and Playfair Display fonts are intact
Verify HTML entry point contains correct root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Raavni Agrobyte application
Verify application entry point correctly sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element
Verify Tailwind configuration extends default theme with custom OKLCH color system, typography plugins, custom animations (accordion, fade-in, slide-up), and responsive container settings
